meanings.definition: A shrub or small tree of the dogwood family, with clusters of small white flowers and red or black berries.
meanings.sent1: The cornel in the garden bloomed with pretty white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked some ripe berries from the cornel tree.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorns under the cornel tree.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as the red berries on the cornel.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the cornel flowers filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A hard, fine-grained wood from the cornel tree, used for making walking sticks and tool handles.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa carved a beautiful walking stick from the sturdy cornel wood.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter crafted a new tool handle from the durable cornel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat sharpened its claws on the cornel walking stick.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as sharp as a tool made of cornel wood.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the cornel wood felt pleasant to the touch.
